projectGridLines.title: Development of Enterprise grade Quantum Safe VPN & VC solution.
projectGridLines.description:
Will be required to assist and be part of the team in development of Enterprise grade Solutions (for both Internet and

Air gapped networks) like VPN,Video Conference like Zoom and Secure Messenger like WhatsApp, SIGNAL etc.

Should be capable of doing Research and Implementation of Cryptographic protocols.

Languages... Golang, C, C++ ,Objective C/SWIFT (Any One of these)

Tools & Technologies...Linux, OpenSSL, NMAP and GIT.

Note. Knowledge in cryptographic protocols Symmetric Encryption, Asymmetric Encryption ( RSA,ECC),

Authentication protocols, Hash Protocols and Digital Signature will be good.
